PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-04132019-05-03TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActTransportation of Dangerous Goods Act, 1992
SubjectTransportation of Dangerous Goods by Rail Security Regulations
PrecisTRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS BY RAIL SECURITY REGULATIONS in order to (1) enhance the security of the transportation of dangerous goods by rail; (2) strengthen the security of the rail supply chain; (3) enhance the alignment of Canada's transportation of dangerous goods by rail security regime with that of the United States; and (4) align Canada's transportation of dangerous goods by rail security regime with international standards and best practices.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0113 Publication Date: 2019-05-15
